lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The partnership said the offer is further conditioned on GenCorp management withdrawing its proposals to amend the company's articles of incorporation and code of regulations to provide for an increase in authorized common shares, a classified board of directors and the elimination of cumulative voting.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company faces challenges to its two television and 12 radio station licenses, partly becuase it failed to inform the FCC about allegedly improper foreign payments and political contributions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: General Partners said it would set up voting trust arrangements pending review of its long-form application for FCC approval of its acquisition of control of GenCorp's broadcasting subsidiary.
